description: Current Information System Contingency Plan (ISCP) using the FedRAMP template, including all appendices
Contingency Plan Test Report (Appendix G) documenting the most recent annual functional exercise results
Business Impact Analysis (BIA) documenting Recovery Time Objectives (RTO) and Recovery Point Objectives (RPO)
Service Level Agreement (SLA) defining recovery time and recovery point objectives for contingency operations
Evidence of backup verification testing conducted at least monthly, including media reliability and information integrity test results
Backup and restoration logs demonstrating daily incremental and weekly full backups of user-level, system-level, and documentation
Alternate processing site agreement(s) and documentation of equivalent security controls at alternate sites
Alternate storage site agreement(s) and documentation of geographic separation from primary sites
Telecommunications service provider agreements, including priority-of-service provisions and evidence of provider contingency plan reviews
Evidence of annual contingency training completion for personnel with contingency roles and responsibilities
Contingency plan distribution list showing key contingency personnel by name and role
Documentation of cryptographic mechanisms used to protect backup information at rest and in transit
Evidence of annual contingency policy and procedures review and approval
Inventory of critical system assets supporting essential mission and business functions
Capacity planning documentation demonstrating sufficient resources for contingency operations
